steps.name: Checking that input "Email" has a value "user.name@gmail.com"
Checking that input "Username" has a value "username"
Checking that input "Password" has a value "password"
Checking that current url matches pattern ".*/#/dashboard"
Set file "testdata/files/image.png" to the file input "Upload"
Checking that icon "Image upload info" is visible
Checking that text "Image upload info title" is visible
Checking that text "Image upload info title" has text "Tap on "Upload image" button to select file"
Checking that text "Image upload info description" is visible
Checking that text "Image upload info description" has text "Recommended file size 540X300"
Checking that button "Upload image" is visible
Checking that button "Remove image" is visible
Checking that input "Title" has a value "Playwright"
Fill input "Estimated time" to value "2 weeks"
Checking that input "Estimated time" has a value "2 weeks"
Checking that textarea "Description" has a value "Playwright"
Checking that input "Max score" has a value "100"
Checking that input "Min score" has a value "10"
Checking that button "Create course" is visible
Check visible course view at index "0"
Checking that text "Max score" is visible
Checking that text "Max score" has text "Max score: 100"
Checking that text "Min score" is visible
Checking that text "Min score" has text "Min score: 10"
Checking that text "Estimated time" is visible
Checking that text "Estimated time" has text "Estimated time: 2 weeks"
Open course menu at index "0" and click edit
Checking that input "Title" has a value "New Playwright"
Fill input "Estimated time" to value "3 weeks"

Checking that textarea "Description" has a value "New Playwright"
Checking that input "Max score" has a value "1000"
Checking that input "Min score" has a value "100"

Checking that text "Title" has text "New Playwright"
